attributes.action: Government must respect the voters democratic vote for Brexit.
attributes.background: Government must ensure the will of the people as demonstrated in the June referendum be upheld. The people voted to leave, and this must be respected. The Parliament is Democratically elected by the will of the people and MUST respect their decision on Brexit !

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
